member.name: T:BSIEncryptionKey.KeyGenerator
member.summary: This class handles the windows form that can be used to generate an enecryped 256bit key and test the encryption and decryption algorithms.

member.name: M:BSIEncryptionKey.KeyGenerator.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize windows form

member.name: M:BSIEncryptionKey.KeyGenerator.KeygenButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Generate key button click. This method handles the geneate key button being clicked

member.name: M:BSIEncryptionKey.KeyGenerator.EncryptButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This metho dhandles the ecnryption button being pressed. The encryption method takes the key from the key textbox and uses it to encrpyt the plain text that is in the encrypted in box Key must be 32bytes or 256bits. The key must be manually input into the input key text box The plain text field must be populated

member.name: M:BSIEncryptionKey.KeyGenerator.DecryptButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The decrypt button handles the decrypting test of a plain text encrypted string using the existing key in the key encrypted in text box.

member.name: M:BSIEncryptionKey.KeyGenerator.SaveKeyButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The save key button method handles saving the generated key to a text file using the file dialogue window.
